metadata.name: LEELOO
metadata.description:
Diverge released its Genesis Total Look as an exclusive 1/1 NFT fashion artwork, in collaboration with digital avatar Ninocence and 3D artist Regie.

The Lilac jumpsuit wired up with flashing LEDs was inspired by the main character of the 5th Element movie “LeeLoo”. This sophisticated outfit is the quintessence of many years of experience in fashion, a high level of fashion vision, a great passion for sci-fi and a huge passion for the web 3. 

What if Leeloo from The Fifth Element would live in the Metaverse? What would she wear? We were wondering these questions while creating this look. 

This NFT is a rare 1/1 edition artwork coming with exclusive utilities for the owner: 

-a 3D artwork by Diverge (4k render still shot)
-Editorial-quality photo of you wearing this jumpsuit (1 time use only)
-Decentraland wearable
-Decentraland emote
-Special role in Diverge Discord with an access to exclusive channels
-Allow list to the next drop: IT Bags 2.0 – Underwater edition
